code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import authReducer from'./slices/authSlice';import cartReducer from'./slices/cartSlice';import productReducer from'./slices/productSlice';import orderReducer from'./slices/orderSlice';import wishlistReducer from'./slices/wishlistSlice';import uiReducer from'./slices/uiSlice';export const store=configureStore({reducer:{auth:authReducer,cart:cartReducer,products:productReducer,orders:orderReducer,wishlist:wishlistReducer,ui:uiReducer},middleware:getDefaultMiddleware=>getDefaultMiddleware({serializableCheck:{ignoredActions:['persist/PERSIST']}})});
